CustomField.formula: IF( Opportunity__r.Subscription_Start_Date__c > (Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c + ( 30 + /* Calculate the number of days left in the month of the Contract Start Date*/ CASE( MONTH(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 1, 31 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 2, IF(MOD(YEAR(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 4) = 0, 29 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 28 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c)), 3, 31 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 4, 30 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 5, 31 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 6, 30 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 7, 31 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 8, 31 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 9, 30 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 10, 31 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 11, 30 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 12, 31 - DAY(Opportunity__r.Startdate_contract__c), 0 ))), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Project start date approval required?
